results.title: Role of Drug-Gene Interactions and Pharmacogenetics in Simvastatin-Associated Pulmonary Toxicity
results.text_hl: It is therefore hard to give a reliable indication of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ in the whole population of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ users.
